\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=2]
\begin{groupplot}[
    group style={
        group name=my plots,
        group size=1 by 3,
        xlabels at=edge bottom,
        ylabels at=edge left,
        xticklabels at=edge bottom,
        vertical sep=0pt
    },
    %ybar,
    footnotesize,
    width=0.75\textwidth,
    height=0.35\textwidth,
    xlabel=Disease, % H=0.85
    %ylabel=Number of Agents,
    xmin=0, xmax=1,
    ymin=0, ymax=1,
    xtick={0,0.2,...,1.01},
    ytick={0,0.5,1},
   % xticklabels={A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J,K},
    tickpos=left,
    ytick align=outside,
    xtick align=outside
]
	\nextgroupplot [ylabel=$N_A$, ymax = 1.2] %% for different yaxis limits 

% altruist unstable
			\addplot[smooth,  thick, dashed, purple] table [] {\AltruistUnstable};
			% altruist stable
			\addplot[smooth,  thick, purple] table [] {\AltruistStable};
			% altruist saddle
			\addplot[smooth,  thick, purple, dashed] table [] {\AltruistSaddle};
			
			% mixed state
			%\addplot[smooth, ultra thick, purple, dashed] coordinates { (0.3,0.812) (0.324,-0.1) }; 

			% region lines
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.62,-0.1) (0.62,1.2) }; % 5-6
			%\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.57,-0.1) (0.57,1.1) }; % 4-5
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.5,-0.1) (0.5,1.2) }; % 3-4
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.3,-0.1) (0.3,1.2) };	% 2-3
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.324,-0.1) (0.324,1.2) }; % 1-2


	\nextgroupplot [ylabel = $N_S$, ymax=1.2]
			% selfish stable
			\addplot[smooth,  thick, green!80] table [] {\SelfishStable};
			% selfish unstable
			\addplot[smooth,   thick, dashed, green!80] table [] {\SelfishUnstable};

			% region lines
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.62,-0.1) (0.62,1.2) }; % 5-6
			%\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.57,-0.1) (0.57,1.1) }; % 4-5
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.5,-0.1) (0.5,1.2) }; % 3-4
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.3,-0.1) (0.3,1.2) };	% 2-3
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.324,-0.1) (0.324,1.2) }; % 1-2

			% mixed state
			%\addplot[smooth, ultra thick, green!80, dashed] coordinates { (0.324,0.315) (0.3,0) }; 

	\nextgroupplot [ymax=1.2, ymin=0, ylabel=$N_E$] %% for different yaxis limits 
			% void unstable 1 
			\addplot[smooth,  thick, black, dashed] coordinates {(0,1) (0.5,1)};
			% void stable  
			\addplot[smooth,  thick, black] coordinates {(0.5,1) (1,1)};
			
			
			% region lines
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.62,-0.1) (0.62,1.4) }; % 5-6
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.5,-0.1) (0.5,1.4) }; % 3-4
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.3,-0.1) (0.3,1.4) };	% 2-3
			\addplot[black!30] coordinates { (0.324,-0.1) (0.324,1.4) }; % 1-2
			

			% region labels
						\node[] at (axis cs:0.81,0.3) {$(5)$};	
						\node[] at (axis cs:0.56,0.3) {$(4)$};	
						\node[] at (axis cs:0.4,0.3) {$(3)$};	
						\node[] at (axis cs:0.31,0.3) {$(2)$};
						\node[] at (axis cs:0.16,0.3) {$(1)$};

\end{groupplot}
\end{tikzpicture}
